main event: A bright light was observed over Baltimore, Maryland on January 8, 1965, by a witness while driving.
interesting points: The object was described as 50 to 60 ft in diameter and grey in color., The witness noted that the object traveled at an estimated speed of 800 mph without making any sound., It exhibited a strange luminescent glow and made a downward curve before disappearing., Two other reliable witnesses confirmed the same sighting., The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: a 21-year-old male named John Smith who reported to Air Police Sgt, Andrews AFB
